author: James Walker
title: Republican Senator Calls for International Investigation Into Chinese Government Over COVID-19 Outbreak
description: Josh Hawley unveiled a resolution that also called for the international community to devise a way of getting compensation for China over damage caused by the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
A Republican senator has introduced a resolution calling for an international investigation into the Communist Party of China's actions amid the outbreak of COVID-19.
Sen. Josh Hawley of Missouri said on Tuesday morning that he would be seeking a full probe … [+2776 chars]
